Room.Name: Castle Rutger Slide
Room.ShortDescription: Oooops! This is one slippery slide!
Room.LongDescription: You are traveling swiftly down a careening slide, and have come to a point where you must reverse direction as you continue your downard journey. This slide is not nearly big enough to bring much equipment down it, but it sure provides a fast attack for troops who must get from the castle above to the road below in time of emergency.
